description.raw:
Create a common support for gz11 branches \(\_gz1\_hook.bash\) that automatize different settings for getting the right Linux builds.

Converted the sdformat support to use this common base and ported ign-math and ign-transport:

* sdformat 

    ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=sdformat-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64)

    [https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/sdformat-ci-pr\_any-ubuntu\_auto-amd64/10/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/sdformat-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/10/)


* ign-math

    ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_math-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64&build=24)

    [https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ignition\_math-ci-pr\_any-ubuntu\_auto-amd64/24/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ignition_math-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/24/)


* ign-transport

    ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64&build=17)

    [https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ignition\_transport-ci-pr\_any-ubuntu\_auto-amd64/17/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/17/)
